referenceObject.reference: Griswold, C., Ubick, D., Ledford, J. & Polotow, D. (2022). A revision of the Malagasy crack-leg spiders of the genus Uduba Simon 1880 (Araneae, Udubidae), with description of 35 new species from Madagascar. Proceedings of the California Academy of Sciences (4) 67(Supplement 2): 1-193.
